name: automation-testing
description: hybrid automation tool for pupeteer and selenium with mocha-chai

scripts.test: npm run test:puppeteer_chrome ; npm run test:puppeteer_firefox ; npm run test:selenium_chrome ; npm run test:selenium_firefox
scripts.test:withOutSendingMail: mocha --opts mocha.opts -- puppeteer_chrome ; mocha --opts mocha.opts -- puppeteer_firefox ; mocha --opts mocha.opts -- selenium_chrome ; mocha --opts mocha.opts -- selenium_firefox
scripts.test:parallel: npm run test:puppeteer_chrome & npm run test:puppeteer_firefox & npm run test:selenium_chrome & npm run test:selenium_firefox
scripts.test:puppeteer_firefox: mocha --opts mocha.opts -- puppeteer_firefox ; mocha --require babel-core/register test/sendMail.spec.js --timeout 30s -- puppeteer_firefox

author: stepanchaparyan
